sense.gloss: kōji, malted rice, malt, malt-like material from growing mold on rice, barley, beans, etc. (used as a starter to make sake, miso, soy sauce, etc.)
fish, meat, vegetables, etc. pickled in kōji and salt, food pickled in malted rice
